verses.name: Exodus 30:4
verses.text: And two golden rings shalt thou make to it under the crown of it, by the two corners thereof, upon the two sides of it shalt thou make it; and they shall be for places for the staves to bear it withal.

verses.name: Exodus 30:5
verses.text: And thou shalt make the staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold.

verses.name: Exodus 30:6
verses.text: And thou shalt put it before the vail that is by the ark of the testimony, before the mercy seat that is over the testimony, where I will meet with thee.
